thread.title: In great decline! Do not stay here.
thread.title_full: In great decline! Do not stay here. - Review of The Franklin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: travlfamily
title: In great decline! Do not stay here.
text: We stay here regularly when in NYC and have noticed an enormous decline in this hotel. To name a few: newspapers have been discontinued, staff (except for bellmen and porters) are rude, breakfast room is not clean and furniture is drooping with age. Zero follow up from front desk staff when voicing a concern. What a shame--this used to be a delightful little hotel.
